AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: tanner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was rather skilled at tanning hides, and turning leather into apparel. [PAWN_possessive] skills were always in demand, as Maormer seemed to have an aversion to apparel made out of cloth.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: net maker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Nets were a highly in demand commodity on Pyandonea, and [PAWN_nameDef] took great advantage of it. [PAWN_pronoun] would always spread the many uses of nets to any potential customers, and even managed to gain the eyes of a few high ranking members of a pirate band.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rather skilled smith, and had produced many of the weapons used by the Maormeri Navy, and quite a few of the ones used by the various Maormer pirate groups. [PAWN_nameDef] didn't really care who made the orders, as coin is coin.
